context: A command and control behavior incident involving malware was blocked. This malware could receive commands from remote attackers and perform activities associated with cyber attacks. The malware was found on the machine with hostname `vnevado-win10r`, it seemed to access the URL `http://vectorsandarrows.com/` using the command `curl http://vectorsandarrows.com`.
question: What was the IP address associated with the Manatee Tempest activity group mentioned in the related alert?
solution_steps: A command and control behavior was blocked which indicates active malware on the account with AadUserId `731adb71-b11c-4bbf-850b-57989b350e96`.
Activity related to the Manatee Tempest cybercriminal group was detected involving the IP address `198.43.121.209`.
